Uses of Package
com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.process

Packages that use com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.process
com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.process Contains ProcessBuilder2, Process2, and supporting classes. 
 

Classes in com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.process used by com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.process
AbstractProcessSettings
          This is the shared base class for ProcessBuilder2 and Process2.
AbstractProcessSettings.ChildProcessState
          Used by the copy constructor to distinguish between copies of ProcessBuilder2, where the child process has not started, and Process2, where the child process has started.
Process2
          Instances of this class must be created via ProcessBuilder2.start().
ProcessBuilder2
          This class is used to spawn external child processes by calling ProcessBuilder2.start().
ProcessOutputStreamSettings
          This simple class holds the settings for child process output streams (either STDOUT or STDERR) before the child process starts.
ReadInputStreamThread
          Used by Process2 to read STDOUT or STDERR streams from a child process.
WaitForProcessThread
          Used by Process2 to wait (with a timeout period) for a child process to terminate.
WriteOutputStreamThread
          Used by Process2 to write to STDIN stream of a child process.
